data.title: 2021 – Government Arts College Salem
data.text:
BA TAMIL

PROGRAM EDUCATIONAL OBJECTIVES:

The educational objectives for the program of B.A TAMIL are as follows

To provide the basic and essential knowledge regarding various activities undertaken and necessary to run socially responsible.

To inculcate certain basic language skills and aptitude, which will be useful in taking up particular activity in community.

To impart global view of the several community and other organizations and their functions which support the social system.

To develop the personality so as to become responsible citizen and mould them according to the socity requirements.

Program Specific Outcomes (PSOs)

PSO No. Program Specific Outcomes Upon completion of the B.A Degree Programme, the graduate will be able to PSO-1 The B.A graduates of our department will gain a through grounding in the fundamentals of Literature. PSO-2 The predominant outcome of the program with a number of skill, value based and personality development courses PSO-3 which ensures that students are groomed in to up to date assertive and effective language with strong leadership skills, social and ethical consceiousness PSO-4 The Students will acquire leadership qualities and develop their personality to be the successful responsible citizens. PSO-5 Laid platform to enter tourism sectors both at government organizations and private firms by knowing the procedures of travel formalities, ticketing and the organization and functions of travel Agencies which develop entrepreneurial skills in the learner. PSO -6 To inculcate certain basic language skills and aptitude, which will be useful in taking up particular activity in community. PSO – 7 Appreciate literary texts and develop creative ideas. Demonstrate the social and Communication Skills. PSO – 8 Develop the skills required to become graduate teachers at various levels PSO – 9 Acquire the skills needed to pursue career of civil servants both at union and state level. PSO -10 Knowing the fundamentals of research to pursue research career as a mission

COURSE OUTCOMES

COURSE NAME: Tamil Language Course-I Kavithaiyum sirukathaiyum COURSE CODE: 17FTL01

S.No. Course Outcome PSOs Addressed Blooms Verb CO1 Understand the nuances of literary terms and their usage in literary texts 1,2,3,4,5,7 Understand CO2 Appreciate and analyse poems from a critical perspective 1,2,3 Apply and Analyse CO3 Develop the life skills through drama and narrative skills from novel 1,2,5,8 Create CO4 Distinguish the different cultural politics and imbibe the distinguished cultural values 6,7,10 Analyse CO5 Evaluate and examine questions concerning class, race, and gender and apply in real life contexts 7,8,9,10 Evaluate

COURSE NAME: Foundation English I COURSE CODE: 17ETL01

S.No. Course Outcome PSOs Addressed Blooms Verb CO1 Develop clear idea about Indian writing 1,4,7,8 Create CO2 Appreciate the Indian culture reflected in literature 1,3,4,6,8 Analyze and Apply CO3 Enhance the spiritual refinement in human life 1,3 Evaluate and Create CO4 Trace knowledge of the varied and rich cultural heritage of India 1,4,6 Understand CO5 Apply knowledge to understand individual and social behaviour 4,7,9,10 Apply

S.No. Course Outcome PSOs Addressed Blooms Verb CO1 Acquire knowledge about the Grammar and linguistics 2,4,5,6,9 Demonstrate CO2 Ezhutthum adhan elakkanamum aridhal 4,5,6,9 Understand and Analyse CO3 sorkkalin padham kuriththu aridhal 1,3,4,5,6,7 Evaluate CO4 punarchchiyil vuyir panarum vidham kurithu aridhal 4,6,9 Understand and Apply CO5 Marabum vurubum punarum vidham 1,2,3,4,5,8,9,10 Analyse and Apply
